template.name: General Ranking View
template.t:
<!DOCTYPE html>
            
                

                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    LatinChain General Ranking (verified and not verified)
                
                
                    

                        Current time:  UTC


                        
                            

                                
                            
                            Your points:  (,  UTC) has  points at  UTC 
                            

                            
Latin points: 
                            

                            
                              
                                

                                  Chess
                                  Snake
                                  Sudoku
                                
                              
                              
                                

                                  
                                  
                                  
                                
                              
                            


                        
                        
                            Total users in the app: 

                        
                        
                            Total verified users in the app: 


                        
                        
                        
                            $(document).ready(function($) {
                                $(".on-page-search").on("input.highlight", function() {
                                    var searchTerm = $(this).val();
                                    $(".accordion-body").unmark().mark(searchTerm);
                                    if(searchTerm.trim() != "")
                                    {
                                        //$( "#user_question" ).hide();
                                        if($( ".accordion-body" ).text().toLowerCase().indexOf(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) > -1)
                                        {
                                           $('.list-group-item').hide();
                                           $(".list-group-item").each(function(index) {
                                                if($(this).text().toLowerCase().indexOf(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) > -1)
                                                {
                                                    $(this).show();
                                                }
                                            });
                                            
                                           $( "#text_found" ).show();
                                           $( "#text_notfound" ).hide();
                                           if($( ".username_code" ).text().toLowerCase().indexOf(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) > -1)
                                           {
                                                $( "#user_found" ).show();
                                           }
                                           else
                                           {
                                                $( "#user_found" ).hide();
                                           }
                                            
                                           $( "#headingOne" ).addClass("text-decoration-underline");
                                        }else
                                        {
                                            $('.list-group-item').hide();
                                            
                                            $( "#text_found" ).hide();
                                            $( "#text_notfound" ).show();
                                            $( "#user_found" ).hide();
                                            
                                            $( "#headingOne" ).removeClass("text-decoration-underline");
                                        }
                                    }else
                                    {
                                        $('.list-group-item').show();
                                        
                                        //$( "#user_question" ).show();
                                        $( "#text_found" ).hide();
                                        $( "#text_notfound" ).hide();
                                        $( "#user_found" ).hide();
                                        
                                        $( "#headingOne" ).removeClass("text-decoration-underline");
                                    }
                                }).trigger("input.highlight").focus();
                                
                                $("#user_question").click(function() {
                                    $(".on-page-search").focus();
                                });
                                
                                $( ".clear_cache" ).click(function() {
                                    var result = confirm($("#clear_cache_message").text());
                                    if(result)
                                    {
                                        try {
                                            Cache.delete();
                                        } catch (err) {
                                            console.error(err);
                                        }
                                        try {
                                            window.location.reload(true);
                                        } catch (err) {
                                            console.error(err);
                                        }
                                    }
                                });
                            });
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
Are you sure you want to Clear Cache?, it will reloads the page.
                        
                        


                        
                        

                            

                                

                                  
                                  
                                
                                
                            
                            

                                
                                
                            
                        
                        

                          

                            

                              
                                Global ranking () ●
                              
                            
                            

                              

                                
                                    
                                    
                                        
                                        
                                        
                                        
                                        

                                        

                                            
                                        
                                        .  (,  UTC) has  points at  UTC 
                                        

                                        
Latin points: 
                                        

                                        
                                          
                                            

                                              Chess
                                              Snake
                                              Sudoku

template.name: Points View
template.t:
<!DOCTYPE html>
            
                

                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    LatinChain Leaders Board
                
                
                    

                        Current time:  UTC


                        
                            

                                
                            
                            Your points:  (,  UTC) has  points at  UTC 
                            

                            
Latin points: 
                            

                            
                              
                                

                                  Chess
                                  Snake
                                  Sudoku
                                
                              
                              
                                

                                  
                                  
                                  
                                
                              
                            


                        
                        
                            Total users in the app: 

                        
                        
                            Total verified users in the app: 


                        
                        
                        
                            $(document).ready(function($) {
                                $(".on-page-search").on("input.highlight", function() {
                                    var searchTerm = $(this).val();
                                    $(".accordion-body").unmark().mark(searchTerm);
                                    if(searchTerm.trim() != "")
                                    {
                                        //$( "#user_question" ).hide();
                                        if($( ".accordion-body" ).text().toLowerCase().indexOf(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) > -1)
                                        {
                                           $('.list-group-item').hide();
                                           $(".list-group-item").each(function(index) {
                                                if($(this).text().toLowerCase().indexOf(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) > -1)
                                                {
                                                    $(this).show();
                                                }
                                            });
                                            
                                           $( "#text_found" ).show();
                                           $( "#text_notfound" ).hide();
                                           if($( ".username_code" ).text().toLowerCase().indexOf(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) > -1)
                                           {
                                                $( "#user_found" ).show();
                                           }
                                           else
                                           {
                                                $( "#user_found" ).hide();
                                           }
                                            
                                           $( "#headingOne" ).addClass("text-decoration-underline");
                                        }else
                                        {
                                            $('.list-group-item').hide();
                                            
                                            $( "#text_found" ).hide();
                                            $( "#text_notfound" ).show();
                                            $( "#user_found" ).hide();
                                            
                                            $( "#headingOne" ).removeClass("text-decoration-underline");
                                        }
                                    }else
                                    {
                                        $('.list-group-item').show();
                                        
                                        //$( "#user_question" ).show();
                                        $( "#text_found" ).hide();
                                        $( "#text_notfound" ).hide();
                                        $( "#user_found" ).hide();
                                        
                                        $( "#headingOne" ).removeClass("text-decoration-underline");
                                    }
                                }).trigger("input.highlight").focus();
                                
                                $("#user_question").click(function() {
                                    $(".on-page-search").focus();
                                });
                                
                                $( ".clear_cache" ).click(function() {
                                    var result = confirm($("#clear_cache_message").text());
                                    if(result)
                                    {
                                        try {
                                            Cache.delete();
                                        } catch (err) {
                                            console.error(err);
                                        }
                                        try {
                                            window.location.reload(true);
                                        } catch (err) {
                                            console.error(err);
                                        }
                                    }                                    
                                });
                            });
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
Are you sure you want to Clear Cache?, it will reloads the page.
                        
                        


                        
                        

                            

                                

                                  
                                  
                                
                                
                            
                            

                                
                                
                            
                        
                        

                          

                            

                              
                                Leaders zone () ●

template.name: Top 10 View
template.t:
<!DOCTYPE html>
            
                

                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    LatinChain Top 10 Board
                
                
                    

                        Current time:  UTC


                        
                            

                                
                            
                            Your points:  (,  UTC) has  points at  UTC 
                            

                            
Latin points: 
                            

                            
                              
                                

                                  Chess
                                  Snake
                                  Sudoku
                                
                              
                              
                                

                                  
                                  
                                  
                                
                              
                            


                        
                        
                            Total users in the app: 

                        
                        
                            Total verified users in the app: 


                        
                        
                        
                            $(document).ready(function($) {
                                $(".on-page-search").on("input.highlight", function() {
                                    var searchTerm = $(this).val();
                                    $(".accordion-body").unmark().mark(searchTerm);
                                    if(searchTerm.trim() != "")
                                    {
                                        //$( "#user_question" ).hide();
                                        if($( ".accordion-body" ).text().toLowerCase().indexOf(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) > -1)
                                        {
                                            $('.list-group-item').hide();
                                           $(".list-group-item").each(function(index) {
                                                if($(this).text().toLowerCase().indexOf(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) > -1)
                                                {
                                                    $(this).show();
                                                }
                                            });
                                            
                                           $( "#text_found" ).show();
                                           $( "#text_notfound" ).hide();
                                           if($( ".username_code" ).text().toLowerCase().indexOf(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) > -1)
                                                $( "#user_found" ).show();
                                           else
                                                $( "#user_found" ).hide();
                                           
                                           if($( ".accordion-zone" ).text().toLowerCase().indexOf(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) > -1)
                                           {
                                                $( "#panelsStayOpen-headingOne" ).addClass("text-decoration-underline");
                                           }else
                                           {
                                                $( "#panelsStayOpen-headingOne" ).removeClass("text-decoration-underline");
                                           }
                                           if($( ".accordion-chess" ).text().toLowerCase().indexOf(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) > -1)
                                           {
                                                $( "#panelsStayOpen-headingTwo" ).addClass("text-decoration-underline");
                                           }else
                                           {
                                                $( "#panelsStayOpen-headingTwo" ).removeClass("text-decoration-underline");
                                           }
                                           if($( ".accordion-snake" ).text().toLowerCase().indexOf(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) > -1)
                                           {
                                                $( "#panelsStayOpen-headingThree" ).addClass("text-decoration-underline");
                                           }else
                                           {
                                                $( "#panelsStayOpen-headingThree" ).removeClass("text-decoration-underline");
                                           }
                                           if($( ".accordion-sudoku" ).text().toLowerCase().indexOf(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) > -1)
                                           {
                                                $( "#panelsStayOpen-headingFour" ).addClass("text-decoration-underline");
                                           }else
                                           {
                                                $( "#panelsStayOpen-headingFour" ).removeClass("text-decoration-underline");
                                           }
                                        }else
                                        {
                                            $('.list-group-item').hide();
                                            
                                            $( "#text_found" ).hide();
                                            $( "#text_notfound" ).show();
                                            $( "#user_found" ).hide();
                                            
                                            $( "#panelsStayOpen-headingOne" ).removeClass("text-decoration-underline");
                                            $( "#panelsStayOpen-headingTwo" ).removeClass("text-decoration-underline");
                                            $( "#panelsStayOpen-headingThree" ).removeClass("text-decoration-underline");
                                            $( "#panelsStayOpen-headingFour" ).removeClass("text-decoration-underline");
                                        }
                                    }else
                                    {
                                        $('.list-group-item').show();
                                        
                                        //$( "#user_question" ).show();
                                        $( "#text_found" ).hide();
                                        $( "#text_notfound" ).hide();
                                        $( "#user_found" ).hide();
                                        
                                        $( "#panelsStayOpen-headingOne" ).removeClass("text-decoration-underline");
                                        $( "#panelsStayOpen-headingTwo" ).removeClass("text-decoration-underline");
                                        $( "#panelsStayOpen-headingThree" ).removeClass("text-decoration-underline");
                                        $( "#panelsStayOpen-headingFour" ).removeClass("text-decoration-underline");
                                    }
                                }).trigger("input.highlight").focus();
                                
                                $("#user_question").click(function() {
                                    $(".on-page-search").focus();
                                });
                                
                                $( ".clear_cache" ).click(function() {
                                    var result = confirm($("#clear_cache_message").text());
                                    if(result)
                                    {
                                        try {
                                            Cache.delete();
                                        } catch (err) {
                                            console.error(err);
                                        }
                                        try {
                                            window.location.reload(true);
                                        } catch (err) {
                                            console.error(err);
                                        }
                                    }
                                });
                            });
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
Are you sure you want to Clear Cache?, it will reloads the page.
                        
                        


                        
                        

                            

                                

                                  
                                  
                                
                                
                            
                            

                                
                                
                            
                        
                        

                          

                            

                              
                                Top 10 zone () ●

                              
                            
                            

                              

                                
                                    
                                    
                                        
                                            
                                        
                                        
                                            
                                        
                                        
                                        

                                        

                                            
                                        
                                        .  (,  UTC) has  points at  UTC

                                              Sudoku

                                        .  (,  UTC) has  points at  UTC 
                                        

                                        
Latin points:

                                        .  (,  UTC) has  points at  UTC

template.name: Winners View
template.t:
<!DOCTYPE html>
            
                

                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    LatinChain Winners Board
                
                
                    

                        Current time:  UTC


                        
                            Cut at:  UTC


                        
                        
                            
                                

                                    App to user payments (it means, prizes) not working yet.
                                
                            
                            

                            
                                
Prizes will be paid the 15th of each month, if we reach 1000 verified users.
                            
                            

                        
                        
                        
                            

                                
                            
                            
                                
 
your streaming
                                

                            
                            Your points:  (,  UTC) has  points at  UTC 
                            

                            
Latin points: 
                            

                            
                              
                                

                                  Chess
                                  Snake
                                  Sudoku
                                
                              
                              
                                

                                  
                                  
                                  
                                
                              
                            
                            
                            
                                

                                    App to user payments (it means, prizes) not working yet.
                                
                            
                            

                            
                                

                                    Prizes will be paid the 15th of each month, if we reach 1000 verified users.
                                
                            
                            
                            
                                
                                    

                                    
 You are winner, check in this winner list. 

                                
                            
                            
                                
                                     You have been paid
                                    
                                    
                                        at  UTC,
                                     check in your Pi wallet.
                                
                            


                        
                        
                            Total users in the app: 

                        
                        
                            Total verified users in the app: 


                        
                        
                        
                            $(document).ready(function($) {
                                $(".open_streaming").click(function(){
                                    var streaming_url = validateYouTubeUrl($(this).attr("videourl"));
                                    streaming_url = streaming_url[1];
                                    $.colorbox({width: "80%", height: "80%", maxWidth: "80%", maxHeight: "80%", html:''});
                                });
                            
                                $(".on-page-search").on("input.highlight", function() {
                                    var searchTerm = $(this).val();
                                    $(".accordion-body").unmark().mark(searchTerm);
                                    if(searchTerm.trim() != "")
                                    {
                                        //$( "#user_question" ).hide();
                                        if($( ".accordion-body" ).text().toLowerCase().indexOf(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) > -1)
                                        {
                                            $('.list-group-item').hide();
                                           $(".list-group-item").each(function(index) {
                                                if($(this).text().toLowerCase().indexOf(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) > -1)
                                                {
                                                    $(this).show();
                                                }
                                            });
                                            
                                           $( "#text_found" ).show();
                                           $( "#text_notfound" ).hide();
                                           if($( ".username_code" ).text().toLowerCase().indexOf(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) > -1)
                                                $( "#user_found" ).show();
                                           else
                                                $( "#user_found" ).hide();
                                           
                                           $( "#headingOne" ).addClass("text-decoration-underline");
                                        }else
                                        {
                                            $('.list-group-item').hide();
                                            
                                            $( "#text_found" ).hide();
                                            $( "#text_notfound" ).show();
                                            $( "#user_found" ).hide();
                                            
                                            $( "#headingOne" ).removeClass("text-decoration-underline");
                                        }
                                    }else
                                    {
                                        $('.list-group-item').show();
                                        
                                        //$( "#user_question" ).show();
                                        $( "#text_found" ).hide();
                                        $( "#text_notfound" ).hide();
                                        $( "#user_found" ).hide();
                                        
                                        $( "#headingOne" ).removeClass("text-decoration-underline");
                                    }
                                }).trigger("input.highlight").focus();
                                
                                $("#user_question").click(function() {
                                    $(".on-page-search").focus();
                                });
                                
                                $( ".clear_cache" ).click(function() {
                                    var result = confirm($("#clear_cache_message").text());
                                    if(result)
                                    {
                                        try {
                                            Cache.delete();
                                        } catch (err) {
                                            console.error(err);
                                        }
                                        try {
                                            window.location.reload(true);
                                        } catch (err) {
                                            console.error(err);
                                        }
                                    }
                                });
                            });
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
Are you sure you want to Clear Cache?, it will reloads the page.
                        
                        


                        
                        

                            

                                

                                  
                                  
                                
                                
                            
                            

                                
                                
                            
                        
                        
                        

                          

                            

                              
                                Winners zone () ●
                              
                            
                            

                              

                                
                                    
                                    
                                        
                                        
                                        
                                        

                                        

                                            
                                        
                                        
                                            
 
watch streaming
                                            

                                        
                                        .   (,  UTC) has  points at  UTC 
                                        

                                        
Latin points: 
                                        

                                        
                                          
                                            

                                              Chess
                                              Snake
                                              Sudoku

template.name: Winners View
template.t:
<!DOCTYPE html>
            
                

                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    LatinChain Top 50 streamers
                
                
                    

                        Current time:  UTC


                        
                            

                                
                            
                            
                                
 
your streaming
                                

                            
                            Your points:  (,  UTC) has  points at  UTC 
                            

                            
Latin points: 
                            

                            
                              
                                

                                  Chess
                                  Snake
                                  Sudoku
                                
                              
                              
                                

                                  
                                  
                                  
                                
                              
                            


                        
                        
                            Total users in the app: 

                        
                        
                            Total verified users in the app: 


                        
                        
                        
                            $(document).ready(function($) {
                                $(".open_streaming").click(function(){
                                    var streaming_url = validateYouTubeUrl($(this).attr("videourl"));
                                    streaming_url = streaming_url[1];
                                    $.colorbox({width: "80%", height: "80%", maxWidth: "80%", maxHeight: "80%", html:''});
                                });
                            
                                $(".on-page-search").on("input.highlight", function() {
                                    var searchTerm = $(this).val();
                                    $(".accordion-body").unmark().mark(searchTerm);
                                    if(searchTerm.trim() != "")
                                    {
                                        //$( "#user_question" ).hide();
                                        if($( ".accordion-body" ).text().toLowerCase().indexOf(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) > -1)
                                        {
                                            $('.list-group-item').hide();
                                           $(".list-group-item").each(function(index) {
                                                if($(this).text().toLowerCase().indexOf(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) > -1)
                                                {
                                                    $(this).show();
                                                }
                                            });
                                            
                                           $( "#text_found" ).show();
                                           $( "#text_notfound" ).hide();
                                           if($( ".username_code" ).text().toLowerCase().indexOf(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) > -1)
                                                $( "#user_found" ).show();
                                           else
                                                $( "#user_found" ).hide();
                                           
                                           $( "#headingOne" ).addClass("text-decoration-underline");
                                        }else
                                        {
                                            $('.list-group-item').hide();
                                            
                                            $( "#text_found" ).hide();
                                            $( "#text_notfound" ).show();
                                            $( "#user_found" ).hide();
                                            
                                            $( "#headingOne" ).removeClass("text-decoration-underline");
                                        }
                                    }else
                                    {
                                        $('.list-group-item').show();
                                        
                                        //$( "#user_question" ).show();
                                        $( "#text_found" ).hide();
                                        $( "#text_notfound" ).hide();
                                        $( "#user_found" ).hide();
                                        
                                        $( "#headingOne" ).removeClass("text-decoration-underline");
                                    }
                                }).trigger("input.highlight").focus();
                                
                                $("#user_question").click(function() {
                                    $(".on-page-search").focus();
                                });
                                
                                $( ".clear_cache" ).click(function() {
                                    var result = confirm($("#clear_cache_message").text());
                                    if(result)
                                    {
                                        try {
                                            Cache.delete();
                                        } catch (err) {
                                            console.error(err);
                                        }
                                        try {
                                            window.location.reload(true);
                                        } catch (err) {
                                            console.error(err);
                                        }
                                    }
                                });
                            });

template.name: Credits
template.t:
<!DOCTYPE html>
            
                

                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                        $(document).ready( function () {
                            $('#donators').DataTable( {
                                responsive: true,
                                ajax: '/get-credits-data',
                                processing: true,
                                serverSide: true,
                                serverMethod: 'post',
                                columns: [
                                    { data: 'pi_user_code' },
                                ],
                                ordering: false,
                            } );
                        } );
                    
                    
                    Credits
                
                
                    

                        Current time:  UTC


                        
                        LatinChain give its thanks to all the donators who donate Pi:

                        

                          

                            

                              
                                Donators
                              
                            
                            

                              

                                
                                


                                
                                    
                                        

                                            Username

template.name: LatinChain Academy
template.t:
<!DOCTYPE html>
            
                

                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                        function copyToClipboard(text) {
                            var sampleTextarea = document.createElement("textarea");
                            document.body.appendChild(sampleTextarea);
                            sampleTextarea.value = text; //save main text in it
                            sampleTextarea.select(); //select textarea contenrs
                            document.execCommand("copy");
                            document.body.removeChild(sampleTextarea);
                        }
                        $(document).ready( function () {
                            window.addEventListener('unhandledrejection', function (e) {
                                e.preventDefault();
                                e.stopPropagation();
                                e.stopImmediatePropagation();
                                return false;
                            });
                            
                            //(adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
                            
                            var pi_user_id = "", pi_user_code = "", accessToken = "";
                            
                            var passkey = "";
                            var unblocked = false;
                            var show_pi_ad_user = true;
                            
                            const Pi = window.Pi;
                            
                            function set_points(points) {
                                if(pi_user_id != "" && pi_user_code != "")
                                {
                                    var data = {
                                        'pi_user_id': pi_user_id,
                                        'pi_user_code': pi_user_code,
                                        'points': points,
                                        'passkey': passkey,
                                        'accessToken': accessToken,
                                        'csrf_token': odoo.csrf_token,
                                    };
                                    //$.ajaxSetup({async: false});
                                    return $.post( "/pi-points", data).done(function(data) {
                                        data = JSON.parse(data);
                                        //if(data.result)
                                        //    alert("You won " + points + " points");
                                        //$("#refresh").click();

                                    }).fail(function() {
                                    });
                                }
                            }
                            
                            function get_user() {
                                if(pi_user_id != "" && pi_user_code != "")
                                {
                                    var data = {
                                                'pi_user_id': pi_user_id,
                                                'pi_user_code': pi_user_code,
                                                'accessToken': accessToken,
                                                'csrf_token': odoo.csrf_token,
                                            };
                                    //$.ajaxSetup({async: false});
                                    return $.post( "/get-user", data).done(function(data) {
                                        data = JSON.parse(data);
                                        if(data.result)
                                        {
                                            if(data.complete_found)
                                                alert($("#payment_message").text());
                                                
                                            show_pi_ad_user = data.show_pi_ad;
                                            
                                            passkey=data.passkey;
                                            
                                            $("#show_pibrowser").hide();
                                            if(data.unblocked)
                                            {
                                                unblocked = data.unblocked;
                                                
                                                startLatinChainAcademy("#show_content");
                                                $("#show_content").show();
                                            }else if(["Mainnet OFF"].includes($("#mainnet").val()))
                                            {
                                                alert("You can use LatinChain Academy, for testing purposes, until Pi OpenMainnet.");
                                                
                                                startLatinChainAcademy("#show_content");
                                                $("#show_content").show();
                                            }else
                                            {
                                                $("#show_button").show();
                                            }
                                        }
                                        
                                    }).fail(function() {
                                    });
                                }
                            }
                            
                            async function showPiAds(Pi) {
                                try {
                                    const isAdReadyResponse = await Pi.Ads.isAdReady("interstitial");
                                    
                                    if (isAdReadyResponse.ready === false) {
                                        await Pi.Ads.requestAd("interstitial");
                                    }
                                    
                                    const showAdResponse = await Pi.Ads.showAd("interstitial");
                                    
                                    if(showAdResponse.result == "AD_CLOSED")
                                    {
                                        if(pi_user_id != "" && pi_user_code != "")
                                        {
                                            var data = {
                                                        'pi_user_id': pi_user_id,
                                                        'pi_user_code': pi_user_code,
                                                        'accessToken': accessToken,
                                                        'csrf_token': odoo.csrf_token,
                                                    };
                                            //$.ajaxSetup({async: false});
                                            return $.post( "/set-pi-ad-datetime", data).done(function(data) {
                                                data = JSON.parse(data);
                                                if(data.result)
                                                {
                                                }
                                            }).fail(function() {
                                                
                                            });
                                        }
                                    }
                                } catch (err) {
                                    //alert(err);
                                    // Not able to fetch the user
                                }
                            }
                            
                            async function auth() {
                                try {
                                    
                                    // Identify the user with their username / unique network-wide ID, and  qget permission to request payments from them.
                                    const scopes = ['username', 'payments', 'wallet_address'];
                                    function onIncompletePaymentFound(payment) {
                                        
                                    }; // Read more about this in the SDK reference

                                    Pi.authenticate(scopes, onIncompletePaymentFound).then(function(auth) {
                                        pi_user_id = auth.user.uid;
                                        pi_user_code = auth.user.username;
                                        accessToken = auth.accessToken;
                                        
                                        $('#username').html(" " + auth.user.username);
                                        
                                        set_points(0).always(function(){
                                            get_user().always(function(){
                                                //if(show_pi_ad_user && ["Mainnet ON", "Mainnet OFF"].includes($("#mainnet").val()))
                                                //    showPiAds(Pi);
                                            });
                                        });
                                    }).catch(function(error) {
                                        console.error(error);
                                    });
                                } catch (err) {
                                    console.error(err);
                                }
                            }
                            
                            
                            // you usually would check the ads support ahead of time and store the information
                            (async () => {
                                await Pi.init({ version: "2.0", sandbox: $("#sandbox").val() });
                                (async () => {
                                    if(["Mainnet ON", "Mainnet OFF"].includes($("#mainnet").val()))
                                    {
                                        const nativeFeaturesList = await Pi.nativeFeaturesList();
                                        const adNetworkSupported = nativeFeaturesList.includes("ad_network");
                                        
                                        if(!adNetworkSupported)
                                            alert("Update Pi Browser version, please!.");
                                    }
                                  // store adNetworkSupported for later use
                                })();
                            
                                if(localStorage.getItem("loggedIn"))
                                {
                                    auth();
                                
                                    setTimeout(function ()
                                    {
                                        if(pi_user_id == "" && pi_user_code == "")
                                            auth();
                                        setTimeout(function ()
                                        {
                                            if(pi_user_id == "" && pi_user_code == "")
                                                $("#show_pibrowser").show();
                                        }, 5000);
                                    }, 10000);
                                }else if(confirm($("#modal_login_latinchain_v2_message").text()))
                                {
                                    auth();
                                    localStorage.setItem("loggedIn", true);
                                
                                    setTimeout(function ()
                                    {
                                        if(pi_user_id == "" && pi_user_code == "")
                                            auth();
                                        setTimeout(function ()
                                        {
                                            if(pi_user_id == "" && pi_user_code == "")
                                                $("#show_pibrowser").show();
                                        }, 5000);
                                    }, 10000);
                                }
                            })();
                            
                            $( "#clear_cache" ).click(function() {
                                var result = confirm($( "#clear_cache_message" ).text());
                                if(result)
                                {
                                    try {
                                        Cache.delete();
                                    } catch (err) {
                                        console.error(err);
                                    }
                                    try {
                                        window.location.reload(true);
                                    } catch (err) {
                                        console.error(err);
                                    }
                                }
                            });
                            
                            $( "#back" ).click(function() {
                                var result = confirm($( "#back_message" ).text());
                                if(result)
                                {
                                    //history.back();
                                    location.href="/";
                                }
                            });
                            
                            $(".open_streaming").click(function(){
                                var streaming_url = $(this).attr("videourl");
                                $.colorbox({width: "80%", height: "80%", maxWidth: "80%", maxHeight: "80%", html:''});
                            });
                        } );
                    
                    
                    LatinChain Academy
                
                
                    
                    
                    
Are you sure you want to Clear Cache?, it will reloads the page.
                    
Are you sure you want to go back?.
                    
¿Do you want to Login on LatinChain Platform?
                    
A payment was registered. Reload the page to view the changes.

                        Current time:  UTC


                        Hello 


                        Welcome to LatinChain Academy, where you can learn Odoo.


                        
                        
                        


                        
                        

                            Access throught Pi Browser (Pi Network).
                        
                        

                        
                        

                            

DONATE
Donate Pi to unblock LatinChain Academy
Earn Latin points

template.name: LatinChain Sports
template.t:
<!DOCTYPE html>
            
                

                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                        function copyToClipboard(text) {
                            var sampleTextarea = document.createElement("textarea");
                            document.body.appendChild(sampleTextarea);
                            sampleTextarea.value = text; //save main text in it
                            sampleTextarea.select(); //select textarea contenrs
                            document.execCommand("copy");
                            document.body.removeChild(sampleTextarea);
                        }
                        $(document).ready( function () {
                            window.addEventListener('unhandledrejection', function (e) {
                                e.preventDefault();
                                e.stopPropagation();
                                e.stopImmediatePropagation();
                                return false;
                            });
                            
                            //(adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
                            
                            var pi_user_id = "", pi_user_code = "", accessToken = "";
                            
                            var passkey = "";
                            var unblocked = false;
                            var show_pi_ad_user = true;
                            
                            const Pi = window.Pi;
                            
                            function set_points(points) {
                                if(pi_user_id != "" && pi_user_code != "")
                                {
                                    var data = {
                                        'pi_user_id': pi_user_id,
                                        'pi_user_code': pi_user_code,
                                        'points': points,
                                        'passkey': passkey,
                                        'accessToken': accessToken,
                                        'csrf_token': odoo.csrf_token,
                                    };
                                    //$.ajaxSetup({async: false});
                                    return $.post( "/pi-points", data).done(function(data) {
                                        data = JSON.parse(data);
                                        //if(data.result)
                                        //    alert("You won " + points + " points");
                                        //$("#refresh").click();

                                    }).fail(function() {
                                    });
                                }
                            }
                            
                            function get_user() {
                                if(pi_user_id != "" && pi_user_code != "")
                                {
                                    var data = {
                                                'pi_user_id': pi_user_id,
                                                'pi_user_code': pi_user_code,
                                                'accessToken': accessToken,
                                                'csrf_token': odoo.csrf_token,
                                            };
                                    //$.ajaxSetup({async: false});
                                    return $.post( "/get-user", data).done(function(data) {
                                        data = JSON.parse(data);
                                        if(data.result)
                                        {
                                            if(data.complete_found)
                                                alert($("#payment_message").text());
                                                
                                            show_pi_ad_user = data.show_pi_ad;
                                            
                                            passkey=data.passkey;
                                            
                                            $("#show_pibrowser").hide();
                                            if(data.unblocked)
                                            {
                                                unblocked = data.unblocked;
                                                
                                                if(["Testnet ON", "Testnet OFF"].includes($("#mainnet").val()))
                                                {
                                                    startLatinChainSports("#show_content");
                                                    $("#show_content").show();
                                                }
                                            }else
                                            {
                                                if(["Testnet ON", "Testnet OFF"].includes($("#mainnet").val()))
                                                {
                                                    $("#show_button").show();
                                                }
                                            }
                                        }
                                        
                                    }).fail(function() {
                                    });
                                }
                            }
                            
                            async function showPiAds(Pi) {
                                try {
                                    const isAdReadyResponse = await Pi.Ads.isAdReady("interstitial");
                                
                                    if (isAdReadyResponse.ready === false) {
                                        await Pi.Ads.requestAd("interstitial");
                                    }
                                    
                                    const showAdResponse = await Pi.Ads.showAd("interstitial");
                                    
                                    if(showAdResponse.result == "AD_CLOSED")
                                    {
                                        if(pi_user_id != "" && pi_user_code != "")
                                        {
                                            var data = {
                                                        'pi_user_id': pi_user_id,
                                                        'pi_user_code': pi_user_code,
                                                        'accessToken': accessToken,
                                                        'csrf_token': odoo.csrf_token,
                                                    };
                                            //$.ajaxSetup({async: false});
                                            return $.post( "/set-pi-ad-datetime", data).done(function(data) {
                                                data = JSON.parse(data);
                                                if(data.result)
                                                {
                                                }
                                            }).fail(function() {
                                                
                                            });
                                        }
                                    }
                                } catch (err) {
                                    //alert(err);
                                    // Not able to fetch the user
                                }
                            }
                            
                            async function auth() {
                                try {
                                    
                                    // Identify the user with their username / unique network-wide ID, and  qget permission to request payments from them.
                                    const scopes = ['username', 'payments', 'wallet_address'];
                                    function onIncompletePaymentFound(payment) {
                                        
                                    }; // Read more about this in the SDK reference

                                    Pi.authenticate(scopes, onIncompletePaymentFound).then(function(auth) {
                                        pi_user_id = auth.user.uid;
                                        pi_user_code = auth.user.username;
                                        accessToken = auth.accessToken;
                                        
                                        $('#username').html(" " + auth.user.username);
                                        
                                        set_points(0).always(function(){
                                            get_user().always(function(){
                                                //if(show_pi_ad_user && ["Mainnet ON", "Mainnet OFF"].includes($("#mainnet").val()))
                                                //    showPiAds(Pi);
                                            });
                                        });
                                    }).catch(function(error) {
                                        console.error(error);
                                    });
                                } catch (err) {
                                    console.error(err);
                                }
                            }
                            
                            // you usually would check the ads support ahead of time and store the information
                            (async () => {
                                await Pi.init({ version: "2.0", sandbox: $("#sandbox").val() });
                                (async () => {
                                    if(["Mainnet ON", "Mainnet OFF"].includes($("#mainnet").val()))
                                    {
                                        const nativeFeaturesList = await Pi.nativeFeaturesList();
                                        const adNetworkSupported = nativeFeaturesList.includes("ad_network");
                                        
                                        if(!adNetworkSupported)
                                            alert("Update Pi Browser version, please!.");
                                    }
                                  // store adNetworkSupported for later use
                                })();
                            
                                if(localStorage.getItem("loggedIn"))
                                {
                                    auth();
                                
                                    setTimeout(function ()
                                    {
                                        if(pi_user_id == "" && pi_user_code == "")
                                            auth();
                                        setTimeout(function ()
                                        {
                                            if(pi_user_id == "" && pi_user_code == "")
                                                $("#show_pibrowser").show();
                                        }, 5000);
                                    }, 10000);
                                }else if(confirm($("#modal_login_latinchain_v2_message").text()))
                                {
                                    auth();
                                    localStorage.setItem("loggedIn", true);
                                
                                    setTimeout(function ()
                                    {
                                        if(pi_user_id == "" && pi_user_code == "")
                                            auth();
                                        setTimeout(function ()
                                        {
                                            if(pi_user_id == "" && pi_user_code == "")
                                                $("#show_pibrowser").show();
                                        }, 5000);
                                    }, 10000);
                                }
                            
                            })();
                            
                            $( "#clear_cache" ).click(function() {
                                var result = confirm($( "#clear_cache_message" ).text());
                                if(result)
                                {
                                    try {
                                        Cache.delete();
                                    } catch (err) {
                                        console.error(err);
                                    }
                                    try {
                                        window.location.reload(true);
                                    } catch (err) {
                                        console.error(err);
                                    }
                                }
                            });
                            
                            $( "#back" ).click(function() {
                                var result = confirm($( "#back_message" ).text());
                                if(result)
                                {
                                    //history.back();
                                    location.href="/";
                                }
                            });
                        } );
